Title: Allows a suspending authority to condition the early return of a student on such student's voluntary participation in counseling or certain classes
Summary: Allows a suspending authority to condition the early return of a student on such student's voluntary participation in counseling or specialized classes, including anger management or dispute resolution, where applicable.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to allowing a suspending authority to condition the early return of a student on such student's voluntary participation in counseling or certain classes
